snippet.title: Mafia II: Definitive Edition Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Live the life of a gangster during the Golden Era of organized crime in this 4K remaster of Mafia II.

Featuring all 3 campaign add-ons, Mafia II: Definitive Edition is available now, both separately and as part of the #MafiaTrilogy. Get it now! 

Subscribe and follow for more exclusive Mafia Trilogy info:
Facebook: https://facebook.com/mafiagame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/mafiagame
Instagram: https://instagram.com/2k
Website: https://mafiagame.com
